description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Enjoy classic brick breaking action with an exciting new twist on powerups.  Break your way through more than 50 levels and bonus stages, unlocking the ability to replay your favorites and compete for high scores.  A generous supply of powerups and a scoring multiplier keep the game exciting.  Includes the ability to save after each level.  Supports custom soundtracks.
